Pre-Game Insights: England conceded outside of the box – they’re not really the best at closing down this area, 20, 25 metres away from goal.
You can really shoot this one from 30 metres, and if you hit it well the keeper has small chances.
Slovenia do not fear England. A draw should be enough to see them through on three points.
For us, it’s just mentality. Don’t be scared of them, like we weren’t scared of Denmark and Serbia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Slovenia have warned England they will be taking shots from distance - because they don’t believe Gareth Southgate’s side will bother to close them down.
Timi Max Elsnik made his professional debut at Derby County under Gary Rowett.
Slovenia’s midfielder Timi Max Elsnik said that Slovenia do not fear England and that a draw should be enough to see them through on three points.
England’s pressing has come under scrutiny since Morten Hjulmand’s equaliser for Denmark.
